mapper.select: SELECT sd.venue_id venueId, sd.venue_day venueDay, sd.venue_day_limit venueDayLimit, sd.service_id serviceId, count(1) count FROM hm_erp_order_venue_schedule ord LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_schedule sd ON sd.id = ord.venue_schedule_id AND sd.company_id = ord.company_id where sd.venue_day BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} group by ord.venue_schedule_id
